page.title: 12SHILLINGFORD-SUPERNATURAL
page.content:
IN SHILLINGFORD ST. GEORGE THERE ARE THREE HOUSES WHICH ARE HAUNTED.THE PEOPLE WHO KNOW WHICH HOUSES THEY ARE HAVE KEPT IT TO THEMSELVES.THEY DID THIS BECAUSE THE PEOPLE IN THE HOUSES ARE VERY HAPPY. ONE OF THE GHOSTS IS A LITTLE DWARF,THE SIZE OF A CHILD.THIS IS BECAUSE A CHILD WAS MURDERED IN THE HOUSE.THE CHILD WAS VISCOUS (AS THE STORY GOES).THE CHILD HAS COME BACK TO HAUNT THE HOUSE BUT ITS FACE HAS NOW GROWN OLD. NOBODY HAS EVER SEEN ONE OF THE GHOSTS THIS ONE HAS BEEN KNOWN TO MAKE BUMPS AND OTHER NOISES IN THE NIGHT. THE THIRD GHOST HAS BEEN SEEN,THIS FLOATS.IT HAD A WHITE SHEET OVER
HIM.YOU CAN NOT SEE HIS LEGS OR FEET BECAUSE THE SHEET IS SO LONG.
